subject: Re: Watch these, what's going on in the world?
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
I kinda think that, if there is such a thing as the antichrist, it's globalization, and it's mark is money.  Look at what we worship.  Money.  But that's getting into a whole different conversation there... so I'll stop.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> This would be a very ripe time for an antichrist to come into the scene  
> too, calm everything down in all these country's, coming on as a good guy then 
>  starting to pull in the reins on those by control of food, making everyone 
> to  worship him as a god, etc..then get a huge war 3 started, and cause 
> people  everywhere to loose their life, and ruin the planet even further with 
> the  nukes.  There is something going on out there, for sure. sf
>  
>  
> In a message dated 2/5/2011 3:05:37 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
> adrianamjones@... writes:
> 
>  
>  
>  
> Just saw the video with the horse... wow that's really freaky... it's like  
> a ghost, no one disperses where it rides through, and it just vanishes into 
>  thin air as it goes into the thicker crowd.... very visible, half 
> translucent  and sort of blurry
> 
> well it's either 
> 
> a) a hoax or an unintended  glare from somewhere
> or 
> b) the real thing
> 
> That's about the only  two options....
> 
> --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) , 
> "Adriana  Jones" <adrianamjones@> wrote:
> >
> > Australia's been very  badly beaten by weather lately, strange stuff with 
> animals dying - I have to  admit it's strange and they don't give plausible 
> explanations and insult our  intelligence - revolutions in the Middle 
> East.... like I've said before, Snow,  I do have to give you that if these aren't 
> the end times, I'd hate to see how  much worse it can look.... and as for 
> me, I know how morbid this sounds, but  you know what if its the end, please 
> please please bring it on, I am so weary  of the nastiness of people and 
> what they've done to this world and each  other... on the other hand, we also 
> had revolutions before in 1989 and it  wasn't the end of the world, and they 
> say animals die off all the time in  nature (albeit with acceptable 
> explanations).... and we've always had natural  weather disasters... is it possible 
> that the media is just covering stuff too  much, or that we're all very 
> connected with the Internet, so we have an  overload of bad news all the time? 
> (Cause you kn ow the media is not going to  give us the good news, its just 
> doesn't sell as well as the bad news).... who  knows... I have a friend who 
> is Christian and she says that it feels like  we're living in the last days 
> of Rome... sadly, by what I see around me, I  really have nothing with which 
> I can disagree... we can only wait and  see....
> > 
> >
